Package model

Class Turret

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Turret
public class Turret extends Entity
Turrets are objects similar to the player and invaders. With shooting capabilities and getting hit capabilities. The turret is able to aim and shoot directly at invaders from a fixed position. It comes with hp and a healthbar.

    • Turret

      public Turret(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Construct a turret with a given position and size.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate to
      x - absolute x to spawn at (centered)
      y - absolute y to spawn at (centered)
      width - to scale collider and sprite to
      height - to scale collider and sprite to

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Should be overriden to add functionality for game tick updates. If instantiated, the game will be able to call this method on every game update. Will not be called as soon as it is deleted with .delete().
      Overrides:
      update in class Entity

    • damage

      public void damage(int amount)
      Indicates that the turret has taken damage. Deletes the turret when the hp has run out.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of damage taken.
